actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, so as to require that appointments as members of the Board of Veterans Appeals shall be limited to those who have had a period of active duty, or active duty for training, with the military, naval, or air services.

summary.text: Requires that persons recommended for appointment as a member of the Board of Veterans Appeals have served a period of active duty, or active duty for training, with the military, naval, or air service of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, so as to require that appointments as members of the Board of Veterans Appeals shall be limited to those who have had a period of active duty, or active duty for training, with the military, naval, or air services.
